Text:
Here is a suggestion:

Why don't you pack and upload a few days' worth of pictures in one torrent. It would save everyone a lot work and you would stop cluttering the category with  tiny little uploads.

As a bonus you will find that a slightly larger torrent will be better seeded and last longer.

Please try.
my connection does not allow me to upload big torrents.if i do anything against the rules inform me.
